@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault

Package org.prebake.core

Core abstractions such as globs, hashes and artifact listener.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Interface Description
ArtifactListener<ART> A listener that is alerted when a named artifact's state changes.
 

Class Summary
Class Description
ArtifactListener.Factory Provides factory methods for common listener types.
BoundName A name and parameters represented as an unordered key/value map of strings.
DidYouMean Suggests alternatives to possibly misspelled names.
Documentation Structured documentation of a system artifact.
Glob A pattern that matches a group of files.
GlobRelation A parameterized relationship between sets of globs.
GlobRelation.Param Meta-data about a named glob parameter, e.g.
GlobRelation.Solution The result of binding the free parameters in a glob relation.
GlobSet A set of Globs that can be applied to an input path to figure out the set of globs that match it.
Hash An MD5 hash generated from files, strings, or groups of hashes.
Hash.Builder  
ImmutableGlobSet An immutable GlobSet.
MessageQueue Collects human readable messages and tracks whether a larger operation has failed.
MutableGlobSet A mutable GlobSet.
PreformattedStaticHtml A class that takes malformed HTML, removes sharp edges, normalizes it, and provides a plain text alternative.
 

Enum Summary
Enum Description
Documentation.Field Correspond to JavaScript property names in the JSON form.
 

Exception Summary
Exception Description
Glob.GlobSyntaxException Thrown when trying to convert a malformed string into a glob.
 

Package org.prebake.core Description

Core abstractions such as globs, hashes and artifact listener.
